entries.name: Critical Fumble Deck #1
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Meant to do That

You are moved 10 feet in a random direction (determined by the GM). This movement triggers reactions.

Melee
Misjudged the Distance Until the end of your next turn, all your range increment penalties are doubled.

Ranged
Not the Weak Point You take 1d6 persistent bleed damage and can't use this attack until the end of your next turn.

Unarmed
How did that Happen? You call forth a mist with the effects of stinking cloud centered on a corner of your space (determined by the GM).

Spell

entries.name: Critical Fumble Deck #10
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Off Balance You take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Melee
Friendly Fire You the ally nearest to the target.

Ranged
Something's Broken You take 1d4 bludgeoning damage, and you can't use this attack until healed.

Unarmed
Power Drain You one prepared spell or spell slot (determined randomly by the GM).

Spell

entries.name: Critical Fumble Deck #11
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Slipped You fall prone.

Melee
Backfire You hit yourself instead of the target.

Ranged
Bruised Ego You can't attack another creature until the target is knocked out or the end of your next turn.

Unarmed
Nosebleed You take 1 persistent bleed damage.

Spell

entries.name: Critical Fumble Deck #12
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Second Thoughts You are sickened 3.

Melee
Mix it Up You can't make ranged attacks until the end of your next turn.

Ranged
Hangnail If you attacked with a claw or fist, you can't use that attack until the end of your next turn.

Unarmed
Magic Vacuum The effects of all beneficial spells affecting you end immediately.

Spell

entries.name: Critical Fumble Deck #13
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Butterfingers You drop the weapon you made the attack with.

Melee
Snapped String If the attack used a weapon in the bow group, the string snaps, requiring 3 Interact actions to fix.

Ranged
Torn Muscle Until healed, you are enfeebled 1.

Unarmed
Magic Fatigue You can't cast any spells until the end of your next turn.

Spell

entries.name: Critical Fumble Deck #14
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Notched Your weapon takes 1d6 damage, ignoring Hardness.

Melee
Notched Fingers You take 1d4 persistent bleed damage.

Ranged
Hit the Wall You are fatigued.

Unarmed
Electrical Feedback You take 2d6 electricity damage.

Spell

entries.name: Critical Fumble Deck #15
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Broken Weapon Your weapon's current Hit Point are reduced to its Broken Threshold. If already broken, the weapon takes 3d6 damage, ignoring Hardness.

Melee
My Spleeny Bits! You become wounded 1 or your wounded value increases by 1.

Ranged
Frustration You take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Unarmed
Beastly Rift Your spell becomes a summon animal spell of the same level. The animal attacks you.

Spell

entries.name: Critical Fumble Deck #16
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Fling You drop the weapon you used for the attack. It lands 1d6x5 feet away from your in a random direction.

Melee
Head Rush You are sickened 2.

Ranged
Overextended You trigger reactions as if you had used a move action.

Unarmed
Reflection The spell hits you instead of the target.

Spell

entries.name: Critical Fumble Deck #17
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Pulled Muscle Until healed, you are enfeebled 2.

Melee
Awkward Attack You are flat-footed until the end of your next turn.

Ranged
Bit your Tongue! You take 1 persistent bleed damage.

Unarmed
Spontaneous Combustion You take 2d6 fire damage.

Spell

entries.description:

Unarmed

Unarmed

entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Wrong End If you are using a slashing weapon, you take 1d6 slashing damage and 1 persistent bleed damage.

Melee

Ranged
Overthink It Your target gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against attacks you make against it until the end of your next turn.

Unarmed
Power Down Until healed, you are stupefied 2.

Spell

entries.name: Critical Fumble Deck #20
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
This sword is Heavy You are fatigued.

Melee
Errant Aim Reroll the attack roll, targeting the creature closest to the target (excluding yourself).

Ranged
Awkward Attack You are flat-footed until the end of your next turn.

Unarmed
Bleeding Eyes You take 1d6 persistent bleed damage.

Spell

Name

Crit Effect

Type
Backswing You deal the attack's normal damage to yourself instead of the target.

Melee
Wide Open You are flat-footed until the end of your next turn.

Ranged

Unarmed
Tangled in your Gear You are encumbered until you spend 2 Interact action to free your self.

entries.description:

Crit Effect

Type
Wide Open You are flat-footed until the end of your next turn.

Melee

Ranged
Fist meet Face You critically hit yourself with the attack.

Unarmed
Distance Rift You are teleported to the nearest space adjacent to your spell's target.

Spell

entries.description:

Crit Effect

Type

Melee

Ranged

Unarmed

Spell

Crit Effect

Type
Too much Stuff! You get tangled in your gear and rare encumbered until you spend 2 Interact actions to free yourself.

Melee
Sprain Until healed, you are clumsy 2.

Ranged

Unarmed
Vertigo You are sickened 2.

Crit Effect

Name

Crit Effect

Type
I told you it's Sharp! You take 1d6 persistent bleed damage.

Melee
Klutz You drop the weapon you used.

Ranged
Stop hitting Yourself You hit yourself instead of the target.

Unarmed
Not me, you Fool! You hit the ally nearest to the target.

Spell

entries.name: Critical Fumble Deck #27
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Pin Prick You take 1 persistent bleed damage.

Melee
Spilled Ammo The ammunition from the weapon you're using falls from its container onto the ground. You can spend 1 Interact action to pick up one piece of ammunition spilled this way.

Ranged
Just a Taste You hit an ally adjacent to you or the target.

Unarmed
Tiring Spell You are fatigued.

Spell

entries.name: Critical Fumble Deck #28
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Armor Smash You deal the attack's normal damage to your armor, applying Hardness.

Melee
Lost Grip You are slowed 2 until the end of your next turn.

Ranged
Battered Until healed, you take a -2 circumstance penalty to checks and saving throws.

Unarmed
Unexpected Blast Your spell affects all targets within 30 feet of you. You are immune to this effect.

Spell

entries.name: Critical Fumble Deck #29
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Catch your Breath You are slowed 2 until the end of your next turn.

Melee
Wrong Weapon If you made a thrown attack, you instead throw an object from your gear (determined randomly by the GM).

Ranged
Got too Close This attack grants and triggers a Grapple or Grab as a reaction by your enemy.

Unarmed
You made 'em Stronger The target gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

Spell

entries.name: Critical Fumble Deck #3
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Bad Fall You fall prone and are slowed 1 until the end of your next turn.

Melee
Spraining Shot Until healed, you take a -10-foot circumstance penalty to your land Speed and are clumsy 1.

Ranged
Bad Jam You are clumsy 1 and enfeebled 2.

Unarmed
Exploding Skull You must attempt a Fortitude save. If you succeed, you take 3d6 mental damage. If you fail, your head explodes and you die.

Spell

entries.name: Critical Fumble Deck #30
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Grave Miscalculation You critically hit yourself with the attack.

Melee
Kickback like a Mule You fall prone.

Ranged
Can't find an Opening You can't use this attack until the end of your next turn.

Unarmed
Drawing a Blank Until healed, you are stupefied 1.

Spell

entries.name: Critical Fumble Deck #31
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Stuck Your weapon is lodged into a nearby surface or item. To free it, you must succeed at a DC 20 Athletics check made as and Interact action.

Melee
Archer's Elbow Until healed, you take a -2 circumstance penalty to ranged attacks.

Ranged
Off Balance You are slowed 2 until the end of your next turn.

Unarmed
Spell Shield The target gains a +2 status bonus to saving throws against spells for 1 minute.

Spell

entries.name: Critical Fumble Deck #32
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Bent Your weapon's current Hit Point are reduced to its Broken Threshold. if already broken, the weapon takes 3d6 damage, ignoring Hardness.

Melee
Double Miss If this attack uses ammunition, you use twice the amount of ammunition on this attack.

Ranged
Caught your Attack This attack grants and triggers a Trip or Shove as a reaction by your enemy.

Unarmed
Left Reeling You are stunned 1.

Spell

entries.name: Critical Fumble Deck #33
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Funny Bone You drop one item you are holding (determined randomly by the GM).

Melee
Not my Pony! You hit the nearest animal companion, mount, or familiar.

Ranged
Bad Headbutt You are stunned 1.

Unarmed

Spell

entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Weapon Tangle You can't use this weapon to attack until the end of your next turn.

Melee
Amazing Miss You are stunned 1.

Ranged

Unarmed
You made 'em Bigger The target increases in size, with the effects of a 2nd level enlarge spell.

Name

Crit Effect

Type
Bonk! You are stunned 2.

Melee
Shot your Foot Until healed, you are clumsy 2 and take a -5-foot circumstance penalty to your land speed.

Ranged

Unarmed
Side Effect You are sickened 1. You are also stupefied 2 until healed.

Crit Effect

Type

Sprain Until healed, you are clumsy 2.

Weakened You take -2 circumstance penalty to spell attack rolls and spell DC's until the end of your next turn.

entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Better to Give You hit yourself instead of the target.

Melee

Ranged
Sneeze You are slowed 1 until the end of your next turn.

Unarmed
Spell Rush You are stupefied 1 until healed.

Spell

entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
rang your own Bell Until healed, you are deafened.

Melee
Lowered Guard You provoke reactions as if you used a move action.

Ranged

Unarmed
The magic is Gone You take a -1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls until you score a critical hit.

Spell

Name

Crit Effect

Type
On the receiving End You deal damage to yourself instead of the target.

Melee

entries.name: Critical Fumble Deck #4

Name

Crit Effect

Type
Wait, What? You are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused}

Melee
Don't hit Me! Until the end of your next turn, each time you miss with a ranged attack targeting enemy adjacent to any of your allies, you hit one of those adjacent allies instead (determined randomly by the GM).

Ranged
Pinched Nerve Until healed, you take a -10-foot circumstance penalty to land Speed and are clumsy 1.

Unarmed
Mental Slip You are controlled by the target until the end of your next turn.

Spell

Crit Effect

Type

Melee

Unarmed

Crit Effect

Type

Name

Crit Effect

Type
Winded You are fatigued.

Melee

Crit Effect

Crit Effect

Crit Effect

Crit Effect

Ranged

Unarmed

entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Ranged
Head First! You fall unconscious until you wake up or the end of your next turn.

entries.description:

Type
Bad Grip You take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls with this weapon until the end of your next turn.

Ranged

Crit Effect

Ranged

Crit Effect

Name

Crit Effect

Type

Melee

Ranged
Brutal Collision Attempt a Fortitude saving throw. If you succeed, you're stunned 1. If you fail, you're stunned 2.

Unarmed
Power Transfer The highest-level spell effect currently affecting you is transferred to your target.

Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #1
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Crunch

The target is sickened 3.

Bludgeoning

Forearm Piercing

The target drops one weapon it's holding (chosen randomly by the GM).

Piercing

Surprise Opening

You gain 1 action that you can use before the end of your turn to use an attack action against the target.

Slashing

Allergic reaction

The target takes 1d8 poison damage.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #10
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

I see Stars

Normal damage. The target is dazzled until healed.

Bludgeoning

Pinhole

The target takes 1 persistent bleed damage that can't be removed until the target is healed.

Piercing

Disembowel

Triple damage.

Slashing

Conduit

The target takes a -2 status penalty to AC and saves against your bombs or spells until the end of yoru next turn.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #11
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Broken Nose

The target takes 1d4 persistent bleed damage.

Bludgeoning

Two in a Row

Deal normal damage to an additional target adjacent to the original target.

Piercing

Weapon Strike

Deal normal damage to one of the target's weapons (applying Hardness normally).

Slashing

Nerve Damage

Normal damage. The target is slowed 1 until healed.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #12
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Crushed Toe

Normal damage. The target is clumsy 2 and takes a -10-foot status penalty to land Speed. Both effects last until healed.

Bludgeoning

Stinger

Normal damage. The target is sickened 3.

Piercing

Missing Digits

Normal damage. The target loses 1d4 fingers on one hand and becomes clumsy 1 until subject to regeneration spell or similar effect.

Slashing

Strange Goo

Normal damage and the target is restrained, using your class DC as the DC to Escape.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #13
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Crumpling Blow

The target is knocked prone.

Bludgeoning

Pierced

The target is slowed 1 until the end of its next turn.

Piercing

Throat Slash

Normal damage. The target takes 1d8 persistent bleed damage. The target can't talk, cast spells with a verbal component, or breathe while subject to this bleed damage.

Slashing

Life Leech

If this is a spell, the target becomes doomed 1 and you regain 1d8 Hit Points.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #14
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Shattered Hand

Normal damage. Until healed, the target is clumsy 2 and enfeebled 2, and it can't use one of its hands (chosen randomly by the GM).

Bludgeoning

Right in the Ear

Normal damage. The target is deafened until healed.

Piercing

Stand Aside

Push the target 5 feet.

Slashing

Vampiric Feedback

Normal damage. You regain Hit Points equal half the damage you dealt.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #15
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Numbing Blow

Normal damage. The target is clumsy 1 for 1 minute and must succeed at a Reflex save or drop one item it holds at random.

Bludgeoning

Sucking chest Wound

The target is fatigued.

Piercing
Overhand Chop 1d8 persistent bleed damage.

Slashing
Knockback Push the target up to 10 feet.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #16
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Two for One

 Deal normal damage to one target adjacent to the original target.

Bludgeoning
Pinned Arm As the bow critical specialization effect, and the target can't use one of its arms until freed. If using a melee weapon, you must drop it to gain this effect.

Piercing
Cut Straps The target's armor check penalty doubles until the armor is Repaired (DC 15).

Slashing
Electrocuted If this is a electricity spell or bomb, the target takes double damage, and at the start of its next tu rn, it takes normal damage. Any other bomb or spell deals double damage.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #17
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
And stay Down Normal damage. The target is knocked prone and stunned 2.

Bludgeoning
Ventilated Triple damage.

Piercing
Knockback Push the target up to 10 feet.

Slashing
Frozen If this is a cold bomb or spell, the target takes triple damage and is slowed 2 for 1 round. Any other bomb or spell deals double damage.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #18
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Rattled

Normal damage. The target is confused for 1 round.

Bludgeoning

Guarded Strike

Gain +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.

Severed Tendon

Until healed, the target is clumsy 1 and takes a -5-foot status penalty to its land Speed.

Slashing

Power Surge

Triple damage.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #19
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Nighty Night

Normal damage. The target falls unconscious and can't wake up until the of its next turn.

Bludgeoning

Painful Poke

The target is stunned 1.

Piercing

That'll Leave a Mark!

Normal damage. The target takes 2d6 persistent bleed damage.

Slashing

Devastating Strike

Triple damage. The target is stunned 1.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #2
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Where Am I?

Normal damage. The target is stunned 2.

Bludgeoning

Surprise Opening

You gain 1 action that you can use before the end of your turn to use an attack action against the target.

Piercing

Missing Ear

Normal damage. The target takes a -2 circumstance penalty to Perception check and Charisma-based check except Intimidation until healed.

Slashing

Mind Cloud

The target is stupefied 2 until healed.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #20
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Brained

The target is stunned 1.

Bludgeoning

Kidney Piercing

The target is sickened 2.

Piercing

Fingertipped

Normal damage. Until healed, the target is clumsy 1 and can't use one of its hands (chosen randomly by the GM).

Slashing

Eyeburn

The target is blinded until the end of its next turn.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #21
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Collapsed Lung

Normal damage. Until healed, t he target is enfeebled 2 and fatigued.

Bludgeoning

Never Cluster

Normal damage. The target is stunned 2.

Piercing

Rupture Abdominal Cavity

Triple damage. The target is fatigued.

Slashing

Transposition

If this is a spell attack, you and the target switch places. This is a teleportation effect.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #22
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Bony Masher

Normal damage. Either the target is clumsy 2 and takes a -10-foot status penalty to land Speed or is clumsy 2 and can't use one of its arms (your choice). Either effect last until healed.

Bludgeoning

Punctured Lung

The target is Suffocating until subject to magical healing.

Piercing

Pain and Simple

Triple damage.

Slashing

Hypnotic Link

If this is a spell, the target takes normal damage and is controlled by you until the end of its next turn.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #23
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Overwhelming Smash

Triple damage.

Bludgeoning

Nicked an Artery

Normal damage. The target takes 2d6 persistent bleed damage.

Piercing

Care your Initials

Normal damage. The target is so humiliated it can do nothing but attack you. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt a Will save to end this effect.

Slashing

Distraction

The target is flat-footed until the end of its next turn.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #24
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Ruptured Spleen

Normal damage. The target takes 1 persistent bleed damage that can't be removed until the target has been subject to magical healing.

Bludgeoning

Muscle Severed

Normal damage. Until healed, the target is clumsy 3 and enfeebled 3.

Piercing

Lean into the Blow

Triple damage. You drop your weapon.

Slashing

Funny Bone

The target laughs uncontrollably until the end of its next turn. While laughing, it is slowed 1 and can't use reactions.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #25
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Off Balance

Normal damage. The target triggers reactions as if it just used a move action. It is also flat-footed until th end of its next turn.

Bludgeoning

Chipped Bone

The target is clumsy 1 until healed.

Piercing

Hack and Slash

Triple damage. The target is flat-footed until the end of its next turn.

Slashing

Shrink Aftereffect

Normal damage. The target is reduced in size as if subject to a shrink spell until the end of its next turn.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #26
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Crushed Intestines

Normal damage. The target is wounded 2 and enfeebled 2 until it is no longer wounded.

Bludgeoning

Lodged in the Bone

The target takes 1d6 persistent bleed damage.

Piercing

Severed Spine

The target must succeed at a Fortitude save or be paralyzed until healed.

Slashing

Psychic Overflow

The target takes 1d8 mental damage.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #27
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Crushed Trachea

The target is Suffocating until subject to magical healing. It can't speak while it is suffocating.

Bludgeoning

Pierced Elbow

The target drops one item it is holding (determined randomly by the GM).

Piercing

Long Gash

Normal damage. The target takes 1d4 persistent bleed damage. The DC of the flat check to remove this bleed damage is 5 higher than normal.

Slashing

Vulnerability

The target gains weakness 5 to any damage types dealt by the bomb or spell for 1 minute.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #28
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Skull Crush

The target is stupefied 3 until healed.

Bludgeoning

hand Wound

Until healed, the target is clumsy 2 and can't use one of its hands (determined randomly by the GM).

Piercing

Broad Swipe

The target takes 1d4 persistent bleed damage.

Slashing

Lingering Damage

The target takes 1d6 persistent damage of the same type as the bomb or spell's damage.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #29
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Caved Skull

Triple damage. The target must succeed at a Fortitude save or die.

Bludgeoning

Overreaction

Normal damage. The target triggers reactions as if it just used a move action. It is also flat-footed until the end of its next turn.

Piercing

Paper Cut

The target takes a -2 status penalty to attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

Slashing

Unnatural Selection

Triple damage to aberrations, celestials, fiends, and monitors. Double damage to all other creatures.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #3
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Surprise Opening

You gain 1 action that you can use before the end of your turn to use an attack action against the target.

Bludgeoning

Tongue Piercing

The target must succeed at a DC 5 flat check to cast spells with the verbal component until healed.

Piercing

Brow to Chin

The target takes a -2 status penalty to Perception and ranged attack rolls until healer.

Slashing

Olfactory Overload

The target loses its sense of smell and any scent ability or other olfactory sense until healed.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #30
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

To your thinky Bits

The target is stupefied 2 until healed.

Bludgeoning

Clean Through

Triple damage.

Piercing

Wide Open

The target is flat-footed until the end of its next turn.

Slashing

Hoarder's Wrath

Triple damage to dragons. Double damage to all other creatures.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #31
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Across the Eyes

Bomb or Spell

Name

Crit Effect

Type

Head Shot

From chops to Groin

Name

Crit Effect

Type

Spinal Tap

Name

Crit Effect

Type

entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Thunder Strike

The target is deafened until healed.

Bludgeoning

Nailed in Place

As the bow critical specialization effect. If this is a melee weapon, you must drop the weapon to gain this effect. If this attack already has that effect, the Athletics check to pull free is DC 20 instead of DC 10.

Piercing

Decapitation

Triple damage. The target must succeed at a Fortitude save or die.

Slashing

Returning Spell

If a spell attack, the spell or spell slot is not expended.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #36
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Box the Ears

The target is deafened until healed.

Bludgeoning

Javelin Catcher

Triple damage if the attack was ranged or thrown attack. Double damage for all other attacks.

Piercing

Lip Cut

The target must succeed at a DC 5 flat check to cast spells with a verbal component until healed.

Slashing

Call of the Wild

Triple damage to animals, beasts, and fey. Double damage to all other creatures.

entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Concussion

Normal damage. The target is confused for 1 minute and stupefied 2 until healed.

Infection

Piercing

Flay

Normal damage. The target is enfeebled 3 until healed.

Slashing

Corrosive

If this is an acid bomb or spell, the target takes triple damage and 1d6 persistent acid damage. Any other bomb or spell deals double damage.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #38
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Armor Dent

Normal damage. Deal the same amount of damage to the target's armor, ignoring that armor's Hardness.

Bludgeoning

Eye patch for you

Triple damage. The target is dazzled until healed.

Piercing

Flat-Blade Thwack

Triple damage. You can deal bludgeoning damage instead of slashing damage.

Slashing

Magical Glow

The target glows for 1 minute with the effect of a faerie fire spell.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #39
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Soul-Crushing Blow

The target is doomed 1 and is stupefied 1 for as long as it is doomed.

Bludgeoning

Knockback

The target is pushed 10 feet.

Piercing

Armor Damage

The target's armor also takes the damage (applying the armor's Hardness normally).

Slashing

Draining Strike

The target loses one random prepared spell or spell slot, as determined by the GM.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #4
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Cracked Rib

The target is fatigued.

Bludgeoning

Momentum

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to all attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Gory

entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Breathless

Bludgeoning

Spun Around

Sliced Hand

Normal damage. Until healed, the target is enfeebled 1, clumsy 1, and can't used one of its hands (determined randomly by the GM).

Slashing

Combustion

If this is a fire bomb or spell, the target takes triple damage and 1d6 persistent fire damage. Any other bomb or spell deals double damage.

entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Broken Leg

Grazing Hit

Maximum Effect

entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Muscle Wound

The attack ignores all resistances.

Crit Effect

Crit Effect

Name

Crit Effect

Type

Low Blow

Piercing

Crit Effect

Type

Crit Effect

Type

Bludgeoning

Deep Wound

Piercing

Brow Cut

Normal damage. The target takes 1d4 persistent bleed damage. Until the bleed ends, all creatures are concealed to the target.

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #48
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Crit Effect

Type

Piercing

Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.

Slashing

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #5
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Feeble Parry

The target drops one weapon it's wielding determined by the GM.

Shoulder Wound

Piercing

Hamstring

Normal damage. The target is knocked prone. The target is also clumsy 2 until healed.

Slashing

Cut off from Magic

Normal damage. The target can't cast spells or activate magic items for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Bomb or Spell

entries.name: Critical Hit Deck #50
entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Tiring Blow

Bludgeoning

Leg Wound

Piercing

Spun Around

The target is flat-footed until the end of its next turn.

Slashing

Time Vortex

entries.description:
Name

Crit Effect

Type

Foot Smash

Crit Effect

Crit Effect

Type

Piercing

Name

Crit Effect

Type

Crit Effect

Type

Bludgeoning
